title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: When viewing the Project Properties Info page on motif platforms, the fields (including Path, Type, etc.) are displayed as editable text fields instead of readonly.
EB: When viewing the Project Properties Info page on motif platforms, the fields (including Path, Type, etc.) should be displayed as readonly fields.
SR:
1. Select a Project.
2. Right-click and choose Properties.
3. On the subsequent Info page, observe that the fields (Path, Type, etc.) are displayed as readonly.
